page.title: 05 STARTING YOUNG TO LEARN
page.content: A most important time in the younger children's education is that time they spend at nursery school.Those who live within a radius of half a mile of the area of Dalmilling are fortunate to be able to send their children to nearby {Westwood Nursery School.}This school was completed in 1977 and the staff of 5 plus 1 home visiting teacher cater for the early learning skills of the pre-school children.These skills are, for example,{communicative, social and {manipulative. Many mothers have become involved in the education of their children by taking part in{Open University Courses to learn about children's early development.However, another important aspect is the part mothers play in taking part in the weekly book and toy library and in frequent meetings in the special parents' room.
